titleStmt.title: A treatise concerning prayer; containing particularly an apology for the use of the Lords prayer. / By Thomas Hodges, B.D. Rector of the Church of Souldern.
titleStmt.author: Hodges, Thomas, d. 1688.

notesStmt.note: With a final leaf of errata and a penultimate leaf headed: Adde this after the title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
